actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to make clear that for the purposes of that Act, a general election for the office of President or Vice President includes all proceedings up to and including the selection of the President and Vice President in the electoral college or the House of Representatives and Senate.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act to state that general elections for the office of President or Vice President include all proceedings up to and including the selection of the President and Vice President in the electoral college or the House of Representatives and Senate (thus bringing all such proceedings under such Act).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to make clear that for the purposes of that Act, a general election for the office of President or Vice President includes all proceedings up to and including the selection of the President and Vice President in the electoral college or the House of Representatives and Senate.
